text.div:
ActionPrecheckBehavior

Defines selection frequency behavior for an action or group

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/action-precheck-behavior defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
yes YesAn action with this behavior is one of the most frequent action that is, or should be, included by an end user, for the particular context in which the action occurs. The system displaying the action to the end user should consider "pre-checking" such an action as a convenience for the user
no NoAn action with this behavior is one of the less frequent actions included by the end user, for the particular context in which the action occurs. The system displaying the actions to the end user would typically not "pre-check" such an action

name: ActionPrecheckBehavior
description: Defines selection frequency behavior for an action or group

concept.definition: An action with this behavior is one of the most frequent action that is, or should be, included by an end user, for the particular context in which the action occurs. The system displaying the action to the end user should consider "pre-checking" such an action as a convenience for the user

An action with this behavior is one of the less frequent actions included by the end user, for the particular context in which the action occurs. The system displaying the actions to the end user would typically not "pre-check" such an action
